Text: In this poor quality it is a real crap...

@randyandi: If you like more quality, then go search some FLAC. The whole discography is not in FLAC nor 320 kbps (which is lossy, not lossless).

Besides, you can't even distinguish the loss of quality between 128 and 320. Again, if you are an audiophile, then go buy some LPs.
Dude, so sweet, I am a huge Sonata fan and never found anything of the demos except for the fullmoon one and the song Im hunted, Im so pleased to have found this, big thanks to you!!!
You can distinguish between 128 and 320, at least for most of my music collection. But, I can't really distinguish between 192 and up. Just my two cents. Thanks for the discography! Love this band.
